A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Luke Skywalker rewrite was a total disgrace. He went from someone insisting the most evil and dangerous person in the Galaxy should be redeemed\, to someone that almost murdered a child that had a chance of being evil\nBe logical. When you write for a saga\, write it in a way that makes sense compared to the rest of the story\, and if you truly want something different that rewrites it that drastically\, promote new franchises.
